amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 119-440 to require the Government Accountability Office to publish a study on brokerage accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 395 - 22 (Roll no. 29).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 395 - 22 (Roll no. 29).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
